1029810.name: The Textorcist - Soundtrack
1029810.description:
The Textorcist - Soundtrack is the official soundtrack which includes a collection of 17 headbanging tracks from the game. All tracks composed by the incredible GosT.

TRACK LIST:
01 - The Textorcist
02 - Walking the Streets
03 - Determination
04 - Magdalene
05 - Matthew
06 - Enoch
07 - The Horror
08 - Revelations
09 - Twisted Nun
10 - Ray's Master
11 - Grieving
12 - Furius at Coliseum
13 - Cardinal
14 - The Pope
15 - Lilith
16 - Finale
17 - Glitch Boss
